DOC.brief_summary: To compare the efficacy and safety results of intravitreal bevacizumab alone with bevacizumab + triamcinolone acetonide in neovascular AMD.
DOC.brief_title: Intravitreal Bevacizumab vs. Bevacizumab Combined With Triamcinolone for Neovascular AMD
DOC.criteria: Cases of active neovascular AMD with visual acuity of 20/400 20/40 History of glaucoma or ocular hypertension Disciform scar
